sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { Clock, Calendar, Award, CheckCircle, ArrowRight, FileText } from "react-feather" import DashboardLayout from "../../components/layout/DashboardLayout" import Card, { CardBody } from "../../components/ui/Card" import Button from "../../components/ui/Button" import Badge from "../../components/ui/Badge" import { getUpcomingExams, getAvailableExams, getCompletedExams, getCertificates } from "../../services/api" const Dashboard = () => { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [stats, setStats] = useState({ availableExams: 0, completedExams: 0, upcomingExams: 0, certificates: 0, }) const [availableExams, setAvailableExams] = useState([]) const [upcomingExams, setUpcomingExams] = useState([]) const [recentResults, setRecentResults] = useState([]) const [recentCertificates, setRecentCertificates] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { setLoading(true) const [availableRes, upcomingRes, completedRes, certificatesRes] = await Promise.all([ getAvailableExams(), getUpcomingExams(), getCompletedExams(), getCertificates(), ]) setAvailableExams(availableRes.data.slice(0, 3)) setUpcomingExams(upcomingRes.data.slice(0, 3)) setRecentResults(completedRes.data.slice(0, 3)) setRecentCertificates(certificatesRes.data.slice(0, 3)) setStats({ availableExams: availableRes.data.length, completedExams: completedRes.data.length, upcomingExams: upcomingRes.data.length, certificates: certificatesRes.data.length, }) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching dashboard data:", error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } fetchDashboardData() }, []) const formatDate = (dateString) => { const date = new Date(dateString) return date.toLocaleDateString("en-US", { year: "numeric", month: "short", day: "numeric", }) } const getStatusBadge = (status) => { switch (status) { case "passed": return ( Passed ) case "failed": return ( Failed ) case "pending": return ( Pending ) default: return ( {status} ) } } const getScoreColor = (score) => { if (score >= 80) return "text-green-600" if (score >= 60) return "text-blue-600" if (score >= 40) return "text-amber-600" return "text-red-600" } if (loading) { return (
) } return (

Student Dashboard

Welcome back! Here's an overview of your exams and progress.

{/* Stats Cards */}

Available Exams

{stats.availableExams}

Completed Exams

{stats.completedExams}

Upcoming Exams

{stats.upcomingExams}

Certificates

{stats.certificates}
{/* Available Exams */}

Available Exams

View all
{availableExams.length > 0 ? ( availableExams.map((exam) => (

{exam.title}

{exam.description}

Duration: {exam.duration} minutes
Available until: {formatDate(exam.endDate)}
)) ) : (

No available exams at the moment.
)}
{/* Upcoming Exams */}

Upcoming Exams

View all
{upcomingExams.length > 0 ? ( upcomingExams.map((exam) => ( )) ) : ( )}
Exam Title Start Date Duration Actions
{exam.title}
{exam.subject}
 {formatDate(exam.startDate)} {exam.duration} minutes
No upcoming exams scheduled.
{/* Recent Results */}

Recent Exam Results

View all
{recentResults.length > 0 ? ( recentResults.map((result) => (

{result.exam.title}

Completed on {formatDate(result.completedDate)}

{result.score}%
{getStatusBadge(result.status)}
)) ) : (
No exam results yet.
)}
{/* Recent Certificates */}

Recent Certificates

View all
{recentCertificates.length > 0 ? ( recentCertificates.map((certificate) => (

{certificate.exam.title}

Issued on {formatDate(certificate.issuedDate)}

)) ) : (
No certificates earned yet.
)}
) } export default Dashboard
